comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: That's presumably the New York Avenue Presbyterian Church, just a couple of blocks from the White House.

comment.author: 57668330@N00
comment._content: This was in the original New York Avenue Presbyterian Church (1313 New York Avenue, NW), which was razed in 1950 to make way for building their current building. The pew was moved into the new building.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: rjones0856 and rockcreek:  Thank you for your identification of the church.  We will upload the information and reload the description.

comment.author: 34515493@N02
comment._content: This was probably taken at same time as photos of preparations for the 1913 presidential inaugural and inaugural parade. It is number 2646-10 and is followed by 2646-11, Inaug platform-Wash, Capitol (dated 2/22/13), 2646-12, Capitol showing inaugural platform (dated 2/22/13), 2646-13, Stand in front of Treasury Bldg., and 2646-15, President's viewing stand, White House, 2646-15 (dated 2/22/13)
